name: Veelancer
description:
This is my contribution to the Linux Game Jam 2017.

Goals: Freelancer-style spaceflight, modular spacecraft, crew-management.

What's really in: You can fly around. The Ship is being procedurally generated, and painted. There's also a space station that you can fly to… it takes about 7 Minutes to reach. Enjoy the view.

There's also a options menu, and it's possible to set window-modes and resolution, and some simulation is running in the background.

Controls: Hold left mouse-button to rotate the camera. Hold right mouse button to make the ship steer in view direction.

Escape key should escape immediately.

Sourcecode: You can get all my terribly formatted, completely undisciplined hackjob of sourcecode on github

https://github.com/Glanzer/Veelancer

Great, now what?

As always, if there were enough interest, I might clean the whole thing up, make it feature-complete and develop it a little further.

Let me know what you think.
